item.description:
We’re excited to announce that plan mode in GitHub Copilot is now available in public preview for JetBrains IDEs, Eclipse, and Xcode. Here’s what you need to know about this…

The post Plan mode in GitHub Copilot now in public preview in JetBrains, Eclipse, and Xcode appeared first on The GitHub Blog.
